name: Yui Mizuno
description: {{nihongo|'''Yui Mizuno'''|水野 由結|Mizuno Yui|born June 20, 1999}}, better known as '''Yuimetal''', is a Japanese former singer and dancer. She became known as a member of the [[kawaii metal]] group [[Babymetal]] and the [[Japanese idol|idol]] group [[Sakura Gakuin]]. After being absent from Babymetal since 2017, she officially left the band due to undisclosed health issues in 2018, but remained under contract with their talent agency [[Amuse Inc.]] until 2025, when Amuse confirmed that she had left the agency and wished to pursue opportunities away from the entertainment industry.
